titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of card files related to genealogy projects undertaken by George Byler, Sr. Three card files include information on the descendents of Christian Beiler (1728-1812). The cards list person, spouse, how many children they had, and the numerical code within the genealogy. Another three card files contain similar information on the descendants of Jesse Jacobs (1748-1804). There is also a card index of the Genealogy of John Klingaman and Christiana Hoffma and a card file related to the Stoltztus family. No sources are indicated.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
